ai-patthana16.37:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.37:0.3_0: for the sake of self-worlding extensive objects.
ai-patthana16.37:1.1_0: for the sake of a limited object, not for the sake of any limited object,
ai-patthana16.37:2.1_0: for limited objects, or causes and conditions for the sake of a limited object,
